pages.title: Ritual Note
pages.text: Craft yourself a ritual note using the provided recipe. This will explain how to properly setup and preform an $(d)Essence Ritual$().

pages.title: Preforming Rituals
pages.text: Please note that all candles in a ritual must be lit. Different colored candles can be used in place of any basic soy candle. Right click center of the ritual to use your held item.
